name: Escape to the Nile
description:
Escape to the Nile is a short, relaxing exploration game.

Search ancient temples,  river canyons and abandoned crystal mines as you try to find your way back to the Nile.

Along the way, collect valuable treasures, avoid booby traps and try to run away from a horde of deadly blood sucking spiders!

A short 20 to 30 minute game. But with three difficulty settings and 25 hidden treasures to find, there's enough to give the most experienced adventurer a challenge!
